title: Allow extensions to exist on the Devtools Pane
body: Extensions such as the AngularJs Batarang need to exist on the Devtools page and not in the main browser. Please add this functionality so that tabs can be added to DevTools.

comments.body: Need this for KC3Kai now that Kantai Collection is HTML5 and runs in Edge!
This is also needed for the react, vue, and apollo dev tools!
This is needed to make Ember Inspector work in Edge (link to GitHub issue: https://github.com/emberjs/ember-inspector/issues/619)
We also need this for the aXe accessibility extension! We need the necessary devtools APIs to build an extension for Edge with the same features as Chrome and Firefox.
